title: Grim Reapers’ Corps
alternative_title: Grim Reapers' Corp ; Grim Reapers' Corps ; 저승차사 노동조합
status: Grim Reapers' Corp ; Grim Reapers' Corps ; 저승차사 노동조합
description:
Description :
        Read manhwa Grim Reapers' CorpsMu-hyun, the captain of the Yaksha Corps'an evil spirit disposal unit within the underworldhas worked tirelessly for the afterlife. However, he lost his precious colleagues in an instant. In order to bring them back, he must establish a union in the underworld.
